subjectList.name: Foundation of Information Technology
subjectList.detail: This course covers the basic concepts and tools related to information technology, including hardware, software, and networking.

subjectList.name: C Programming
subjectList.detail: An introductory course to C programming language focusing on basic syntax, data structures, and algorithm development.

subjectList.name: Foundation of Business Management
subjectList.detail: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of business management, including planning, organization, leadership, and control.

subjectList.name: Basic Mathematics
subjectList.detail: The course focuses on basic mathematical concepts such as algebra, calculus, and probability, essential for business and IT students.

subjectList.name: Digital Logic
subjectList.detail: This course covers the principles of digital logic design, including binary systems, Boolean algebra, and logic gates.

subjectList.name: Object-Oriented Programming
subjectList.detail: Introduction to object-oriented programming concepts such as classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism using Java or C++.

subjectList.name: Microeconomics
subjectList.detail: This course explores the behavior of individuals and firms in making decisions regarding the allocation of resources.

subjectList.name: Discrete Mathematics
subjectList.detail: The course focuses on mathematical structures such as sets, relations, functions, graphs, and combinatorics relevant to computer science.

subjectList.name: Web Programming
subjectList.detail: An introduction to web technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to develop dynamic websites.

subjectList.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
subjectList.detail: Covers fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, and algorithm design and analysis.

subjectList.name: Database Management System
subjectList.detail: Introduction to database design, SQL, normalization, and database management principles.

subjectList.name: Financial Accounting
subjectList.detail: This course introduces basic accounting principles and practices essential for managing financial information in businesses.

subjectList.name: Computer Networks
subjectList.detail: Covers the fundamental concepts of networking, including network protocols, architectures, and security.

subjectList.name: Management Information Systems
subjectList.detail: Explores how businesses use information systems to improve efficiency and decision-making.

subjectList.name: Software Engineering
subjectList.detail: Introduction to software development methodologies, project management, and best practices in software engineering.

subjectList.name: Operating Systems
subjectList.detail: Study of operating system principles, including process management, memory management, file systems, and security.

subjectList.name: Business Communication
subjectList.detail: Develops skills in business writing, presentations, and communication strategies in a corporate environment.

subjectList.name: Statistics
subjectList.detail: Introduction to statistical concepts and methods for analyzing data, including probability, distribution, and hypothesis testing.

subjectList.name: IT Entrepreneurship
subjectList.detail: Explores entrepreneurial strategies, business plan development, and opportunities in the IT industry.

subjectList.name: Advanced Java Programming
subjectList.detail: Focuses on advanced Java programming concepts such as multithreading, networking, and database integration.

subjectList.name: Artificial Intelligence
subjectList.detail: Introduction to AI concepts such as machine learning, neural networks, natural language processing, and expert systems.

subjectList.name: E-Commerce
subjectList.detail: Covers the principles and practices of conducting business electronically, including online marketing, payment systems, and security.

subjectList.name: System Analysis and Design
subjectList.detail: Focuses on analyzing business needs and designing information systems solutions.

subjectList.name: Mobile Application Development
subjectList.detail: Covers the development of mobile applications using platforms like Android or iOS, focusing on UI/UX design and backend integration.

subjectList.name: Ethics and Cyber Law
subjectList.detail: Explores the ethical issues related to technology and the legal aspects of cybersecurity and digital privacy.

subjectList.name: Data Mining
subjectList.detail: Covers the concepts of data mining, including classification, clustering, and association analysis in large datasets.

subjectList.name: Enterprise Resource Planning
subjectList.detail: Introduction to ERP systems and how they integrate business processes, covering both functional and technical perspectives.

subjectList.name: Network Security
subjectList.detail: Focuses on security protocols, encryption techniques, and methods for securing networks and protecting against cyber threats.

subjectList.name: Cloud Computing
subjectList.detail: Introduction to cloud computing models, architectures, and services like IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS.

subjectList.name: Digital Marketing
subjectList.detail: Explores strategies and tools used in digital marketing, including SEO, social media marketing, and email marketing.

subjectList.name: Big Data Analytics
subjectList.detail: Introduction to big data technologies, including Hadoop, Spark, and NoSQL databases for analyzing large-scale datasets.

subjectList.name: Business Intelligence
subjectList.detail: Covers the tools and techniques for data analysis, reporting, and decision-making in businesses.

subjectList.name: Project Management
subjectList.detail: Focuses on managing IT projects, covering project life cycles, risk management, and resource allocation.

subjectList.name: Information Systems Strategy
subjectList.detail: Explores the strategic role of information systems in organizations, aligning IT with business goals.

subjectList.name: Elective I
subjectList.detail: Elective course based on students' choice, offering advanced topics in IT or business management.

subjectList.name: Capstone Project
subjectList.detail: Students undertake a comprehensive project that integrates their knowledge across various IT and business domains.

subjectList.name: Cybersecurity
subjectList.detail: Covers advanced topics in cybersecurity, including intrusion detection, incident response, and advanced cryptography.

subjectList.name: Elective II
subjectList.detail: Second elective course offering advanced topics in IT or business management.

subjectList.name: Strategic Management
subjectList.detail: Focuses on strategy formulation and implementation within businesses, integrating various functional areas.
